articles.author: Shawna Mizelle
articles.title: Mike Pence calls potential Trump indictment 'politically charged' and 'not what the American people want to see' - CNN
articles.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence balked at the idea of a potential indictment of Donald Trump, categorizing any possible prosecutorial actions as "politically charged" and "not what the American people want to see."
articles.content: Former Vice President Mike Pence balked at the idea of a potential indictment of Donald Trump, categorizing any possible prosecutorial actions as politically charged and not what the American people … [+4103 chars]

articles.author: Roktim Rajpal
articles.title: Did American fashion designer Law Roach humiliate Priyanka Chopra with 'sample-sized' remark? Ex-stylist reacts - India Today
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra recently said she was reduced to tears after being insulted by a stylist. Law Roach has now reacted to her remarks.
articles.content: By Roktim Rajpal: Priyanka Chopra recently revealed that a stylist once insulted her by saying that she wasn't 'sample-sized' The star went on to reveal that she was reduced to tears following the in… [+1348 chars]
